properties.name: me.ehp246.aufkafka.inbound.messagelogging.enabled
properties.description: Set to 'true' to enable logging of in-bound messages fetched by consumers. See LoggingDispatchingListener for details.

properties.name: me.ehp246.aufkafka.header.correlation-id
properties.description: Specifies the header key for correlation id. On producers, one UUID will be generated for the value if none is provided. On consumers, the header value, if present, will be set to SLF4J's MDC.
